snippet: The corporation that operates the oasis behind the New York Public Library’s main branch hired four artists in residence this summer to paint scenes of park life.
abstract: Bryant Park Management Corp hires four artists in residence for two weeks to paint scenes of park life; officials hope the vibrancy of having live artists working in the park will intrigue visitors, and the paintings themselves may end up as part of an archive of park history in the corporations headquarters.
lead_paragraph: The corporation that operates the oasis behind the New York Public Library’s main branch hired four artists in residence this summer to paint scenes of park life.

headline.seo: Bryant Park Hosts Summer Artists in Residence
headline.main: Painting Bryant Park, While Adding to Its Charm
headline.print_headline: Painting Bryant Park, While Adding To Its Charm
